title: Everyone except for me, the club leader, has access to the club.
body:
Filthy Casuals - NA

Is there something I've not done properly to get clubs working again?

replies.body:
I'm having the exact same issue.

I submitted a ticket and immediately the ticket was "solved" by suggesting I use the hextech repair tool.

Did the hextech repair tool really help work for anyone else with this issue?

> [{quoted}](name=Figgi,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=38pcg7gG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-29T01:14:32.155+0000)
>
> I'm having the exact same issue.
> 
> I submitted a ticket and immediately the ticket was "solved" by suggesting I use the hextech repair tool.
> 
> Did the hextech repair tool really help work for anyone else with this issue?

I used the repair tool to send my report.
Can confirm it _**does not**_  resolve the issue on it's own.

> [{quoted}](name=Xikini,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=38pcg7gG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-29T02:11:25.716+0000)
>
> I used the repair tool to send my report.
> Can confirm it _**does not**_  resolve the issue on it's own.

Thank you sir! I will ask for a human promptly

I've been seeing some issues with clubs since it was restored earlier today.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you out individually, and track the issues that are happening currently.  We'll respond asap!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=38pcg7gG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-28T20:45:01.562+0000)
>
> I've been seeing some issues with clubs since it was restored earlier today.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you out individually, and track the issues that are happening currently.  We'll respond asap!

Submitted. :)

Request #23933940
